description.zh-cn: 一所坐落于香港九龙红磡的公立应用研究型大学，前身为1937年创立的香港官立高级工业学院。
description.en: A public, application-oriented research university located in Hung Hom, Kowloon, Hong Kong. Its predecessor was the Government Trade School, founded in 1937.

nodes.id: 香港官立高级工业学院

zh-cn: 香港官立高级工业学院

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学的前身，于1937年成立，是香港第一所由政府资助、提供专上程度工科教育的院校。
description.en: The predecessor of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, established in 1937. It was the first government-funded institution in Hong Kong to provide post-secondary engineering education.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学的前身，由香港官立高级工业学院于1947年改名而成。
description.en: The predecessor of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, renamed from the Government Trade School in 1947.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学的前身，于1972年正式成立，接管香港工业专门学院的校舍及职员。
description.en: The predecessor of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, officially established in 1972, taking over the campus and staff of the Hong Kong Technical College.

description.zh-cn: 1841年至1997年期间由英国管治的香港。在此期间成立了香港官立高级工业学院。
description.en: Hong Kong under British rule from 1841 to 1997. The Government Trade School was established during this period.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，现任香港特别行政区行政长官，兼任香港理工大学校监。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician, the current Chief Executive of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, and the Chancellor of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

nodes.id: 香港特别行政区行政长官

zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的首长。根据规定，该职位兼任香港理工大学校监。
description.en: The head of the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region. By statute, the holder of this office serves as the Chancellor of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学校董会主席。
description.en: Chairman of the Council of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学现任校长。
description.en: The current President of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工学院前院长及香港理工大学前校长。
description.en: Former Director of the Hong Kong Polytechnic and former President of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学前校长。
description.en: Former President of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾倡议在港成立一所理工学院，并担任香港理工学院首届校董会主席。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who advocated for the establishment of a polytechnic in Hong Kong and served as the first Chairman of the Council of the Hong Kong Polytechnic.

en: The Chinese Manufacturers' Association of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港工业界组织，于1956年捐款一百万元支持香港工业专门学院兴建红磡本部校舍。
description.en: An industrial association in Hong Kong that donated one million HKD in 1956 to support the construction of the Hong Kong Technical College's main campus in Hung Hom.

description.zh-cn: 前香港总督，于1957年为香港工业专门学院红磡本部校舍揭幕。
description.en: Former Governor of Hong Kong who inaugurated the main campus of the Hong Kong Technical College in Hung Hom in 1957.

description.zh-cn: 前香港总督，曾担任香港理工学院首任荣誉监督，并于1976年为学院首期扩建校舍揭幕。
description.en: Former Governor of Hong Kong who served as the first Honorary Supervisor of the Hong Kong Polytechnic and inaugurated its first phase of campus extension in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 英属香港的立法机关，于1994年11月25日通过《香港理工大学条例》，使香港理工学院正式获得大学名衔。
description.en: The legislature of British Hong Kong, which passed The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Ordinance on November 25, 1994, granting the Hong Kong Polytechnic official university status.

en: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Ordinance

description.zh-cn: 香港法律第1075章，该条例的通过使香港理工学院正式升格为香港理工大学。
description.en: Chapter 1075 of the Laws of Hong Kong, the enactment of which officially elevated the Hong Kong Polytechnic to The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 美国跨国公司，与香港理工大学联合成立科研中心。
description.en: An American multinational corporation that has established a joint research center with The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 中国跨国科技公司，与香港理工大学联合成立科研中心。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology company that has established a joint research center with The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 中国跨国科技公司，与香港理工大学联合成立科研中心。
description.en: A Chinese multinational technology company that has established a joint research center with The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 中国的月球探测计划，香港理工大学参与研发了该计划所使用的太空仪器。
description.en: China's lunar exploration program, for which The Hong Kong Polytechnic University participated in developing space instruments.

description.zh-cn: 中国的火星探测计划，香港理工大学参与研发了该计划所使用的太空仪器。
description.en: China's Mars exploration program, for which The Hong Kong Polytechnic University participated in developing space instruments.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲的政府间航天组织，香港理工大学为其火星快车任务研发了“岩芯取样器”。
description.en: An intergovernmental space organization in Europe, for whose Mars Express mission The Hong Kong Polytechnic University developed a 'rock corer'.

en: Roscosmos State Corporation for Space Activities

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯的航天机构，香港理工大学为其太空计划提供了设备。
description.en: The space agency of Russia, to whose space programs The Hong Kong Polytechnic University has provided equipment.

description.zh-cn: 2008年发生于中国四川省的特大地震。地震后，香港理工大学与四川大学共建了灾后重建与管理学院。
description.en: A major earthquake that occurred in Sichuan Province, China, in 2008. After the earthquake, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and Sichuan University jointly established the Institute for Disaster Management and Reconstruction.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国四川省成都市的大学，与香港理工大学合作成立了灾后重建与管理学院。
description.en: A university located in Chengdu, Sichuan Province, China, which collaborated with The Hong Kong Polytechnic University to establish the Institute for Disaster Management and Reconstruction.

nodes.id: 四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院

zh-cn: 四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院
en: Sichuan University - Hong Kong Polytechnic University Institute for Disaster Management and Reconstruction

description.zh-cn: 由四川大学和香港理工大学在汶川大地震后合作建立的学院，专注于防灾减灾和灾后重建领域。
description.en: An institute jointly established by Sichuan University and The Hong Kong Polytechnic University after the Wenchuan earthquake, focusing on disaster prevention, mitigation, and post-disaster reconstruction.

description.zh-cn: 香港的非牟利组织，曾捐款支持香港理工大学与四川大学共建灾后重建与管理学院。
description.en: A non-profit organization in Hong Kong that donated funds to support the joint establishment of the Institute for Disaster Management and Reconstruction by The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and Sichuan University.

nodes.id: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

zh-cn: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 2019年在香港发生的大规模社会运动，期间爆发了香港理工大学冲突。
description.en: A large-scale social movement in Hong Kong in 2019, during which the Hong Kong Polytechnic University conflict occurred.

en: Siege of the Hong Kong Polytechnic University

description.zh-cn: 在2019年“反修例运动”期间，示威者与香港警方在香港理工大学校园及周边地区爆发的严重警民冲突。警方对校园进行了长达十余天的围困。
description.en: A major confrontation between protesters and the Hong Kong Police Force that occurred at and around the campus of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University during the 2019 anti-extradition bill protests. The police besieged the campus for over ten days.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区的纪律部队，在2019年香港理工大学冲突中围困并攻入校园。
description.en: The disciplinary service of Hong Kong, which besieged and entered the campus during the 2019 Hong Kong Polytechnic University conflict.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，在担任香港警务处处长期间指挥了对理工大学的围困，后因此受到美国制裁。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who, as the Commissioner of Police, commanded the siege of the Hong Kong Polytechnic University and was later sanctioned by the United States for his role.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，在担任香港特别行政区行政长官期间爆发了反修例运动及理工大学冲突，后因损害香港自治而受到美国制裁。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who was the Chief Executive of Hong Kong during the anti-extradition bill movement and the PolyU conflict. She was later sanctioned by the United States for undermining Hong Kong's autonomy.

description.zh-cn: 在香港理工大学冲突等事件后，通过《香港人权与民主法案》并对相关中港官员实施制裁。
description.en: Following events such as the siege of the Hong Kong Polytechnic University, it passed the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act and imposed sanctions on relevant Chinese and Hong Kong officials.

en: United States Department of the Treasury

description.zh-cn: 美国的联邦政府部门，负责执行对损害香港自治的中港官员的制裁。
description.en: A federal department of the U.S. government responsible for implementing sanctions against Chinese and Hong Kong officials who undermine Hong Kong's autonomy.

en: Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act

description.zh-cn: 美国的一项联邦法律，要求美国政府制裁负责侵犯香港人权的中港官员。香港理工大学冲突等事件加速了该法案的通过。
description.en: A U.S. federal law requiring the U.S. government to sanction Chinese and Hong Kong officials responsible for human rights violations in Hong Kong. Events like the siege of PolyU accelerated its passage.

relationships.target: 香港官立高级工业学院

description.zh-cn: 香港官立高级工业学院由当时的香港政府资助成立。
description.en: The Government Trade School was established with funding from the Hong Kong government at the time.

relationships.source: 香港官立高级工业学院

description.zh-cn: 1947年，香港官立高级工业学院改名为香港工业专门学院。
description.en: In 1947, the Government Trade School was renamed the Hong Kong Technical College.

description.zh-cn: 1972年8月1日，香港理工学院正式成立，接管香港工业专门学院的校舍及职员。
description.en: On August 1, 1972, the Hong Kong Polytechnic was formally established, taking over the campus and staff of the Hong Kong Technical College.

description.zh-cn: 1994年11月25日，香港理工学院正式获得大学名衔，并易名为香港理工大学。
description.en: On November 25, 1994, the Hong Kong Polytechnic officially gained university status and was renamed The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

relationships.source: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区行政长官依法兼任香港理工大学校监。
description.en: The Chief Executive of Hong Kong serves as the Chancellor of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University by law.

relationships.target: 香港特别行政区行政长官

description.zh-cn: 李家超是现任香港特别行政区行政长官。
description.en: John Lee is the current Chief Executive of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 林大辉是香港理工大学现任校董会主席。
description.en: Lam Tai-fai is the current Chairman of the Council of The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 于1965年在立法局会议中倡议在香港成立一所理工学院。
description.en: Advocated for the establishment of a polytechnic in Hong Kong during a Legislative Council meeting in 1965.

description.zh-cn: 捐款一百万元支持香港工业专门学院兴建红磡本部校舍。
description.en: Donated one million HKD to support the construction of the Hong Kong Technical College's main campus in Hung Hom.

description.zh-cn: 作为时任香港总督，为香港工业专门学院红磡本部校舍揭幕。
description.en: As the then Governor of Hong Kong, inaugurated the main campus of the Hong Kong Technical College in Hung Hom.

description.zh-cn: 时任港督麦理浩爵士出任香港理工学院首任荣誉监督。
description.en: The then Governor, Sir Murray MacLehose, served as the first Honorary Supervisor of the Hong Kong Polytechnic.

description.zh-cn: 通过了《香港理工大学条例》。
description.en: Passed The Hong Kong Polytechnic University Ordinance.

description.zh-cn: 该条例的生效使香港理工学院正式获得大学地位，并更名为香港理工大学。
description.en: The enactment of this ordinance granted the Hong Kong Polytechnic official university status, leading to its renaming as The Hong Kong Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学与波音公司签署合作备忘录，共同建设香港首间航空服务研究中心。
description.en: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University signed a memorandum of understanding with Boeing to jointly establish the first aviation service research center in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学与华为联合成立科研中心。
description.en: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and Huawei jointly established a research center.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学与阿里巴巴集团联合成立科研中心。
description.en: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and Alibaba Group jointly established a research center.

description.zh-cn: 为中国的探月工程研发太空仪器，包括为嫦娥三号、四号、五号和六号任务研制关键系统和装置。
description.en: Developed space instruments for China's lunar exploration program, including key systems and devices for the Chang'e-3, 4, 5, and 6 missions.

description.zh-cn: 为中国首次火星探测任务“天问一号”研制了关键仪器“落火状态监视相机”。
description.en: Developed the Mars Landing Surveillance Camera, a key instrument for China's first Mars exploration mission, Tianwen-1.

description.zh-cn: 为欧洲太空总署2003年火星快车任务研发“岩芯取样器”。
description.en: Developed the 'rock corer' for the European Space Agency's 2003 Mars Express mission.

description.zh-cn: 自1995年起为俄罗斯的太空计划提供设备，并参与2011年的中俄联合探索火星任务。
description.en: Has provided equipment for Russia's space programs since 1995 and participated in the joint Sino-Russian Mars exploration mission in 2011.

relationships.target: 四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院

description.zh-cn: 汶川大地震后，香港理工大学联合四川大学，共同成立了四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院。
description.en: After the Wenchuan earthquake, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University and Sichuan University jointly established the Institute for Disaster Management and Reconstruction.

relationships.target: 四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院
四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院
四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院

description.zh-cn: 捐款2亿人民币支持成立四川大学-香港理工大学灾后重建与管理学院。
description.en: Donated 200 million RMB to support the establishment of the Sichuan University - Hong Kong Polytechnic University Institute for Disaster Management and Reconstruction.

relationships.source: 反对逃犯条例修订草案运动

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学冲突是在“反修例运动”期间发生的一次重大警民冲突。
description.en: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University conflict was a major police-civilian confrontation that occurred during the Anti-Extradition Law Amendment Bill Movement.

description.zh-cn: 在香港理工大学冲突中，警方包围并攻入校园，与校内的示威者发生激烈冲突。
description.en: During the Hong Kong Polytechnic University conflict, the police besieged and stormed the campus, leading to intense clashes with protesters inside.

description.zh-cn: 冲突导致校园被长期围困、设施严重损毁，并被迫关闭。
description.en: The conflict resulted in a prolonged siege of the campus, severe damage to facilities, and a forced closure.

description.zh-cn: 香港理工大学冲突及同月发生的香港中文大学冲突，促使美国参议院快速推动通过了《香港人权与民主法案》。
description.en: The Hong Kong Polytechnic University conflict, along with the conflict at the Chinese University of Hong Kong in the same month, prompted the U.S. Senate to fast-track the passage of the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act.

description.zh-cn: 法案要求美国政府对侵犯香港人权的中港官员实施制裁。
description.en: The Act requires the U.S. government to impose sanctions on Chinese and Hong Kong officials who violate human rights in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 美国财政部宣布制裁时任香港警务处处长邓炳强，因其指挥警方围困理大等行为损害香港自治。
description.en: The U.S. Department of the Treasury announced sanctions against then-Commissioner of Police Chris Tang for undermining Hong Kong's autonomy, citing his command of the police siege of PolyU.

description.zh-cn: 美国财政部宣布制裁时任香港特别行政区行政长官林郑月娥，因其损害香港自治。
description.en: The U.S. Department of the Treasury announced sanctions against then-Chief Executive of Hong Kong Carrie Lam for undermining Hong Kong's autonomy.
